Papers
  • Yenan Sun & Jackie Yan-Ki Lai. To appear. The morphosyntax of Chinese adjectival reduplication: The role of RED. In Proceedings of NELS 49.
  • Yenan Sun & Jackie Yan-Ki Lai. 2019. Revisiting the Restrictive/Appositive Distinction in Mandarin Relative Clauses: The Confound of Demonstratives. In Proceedings of LSA 93. [link]
  • Yenan Sun. 2018. Two strategies of samenss: Chinese tong and xiangtong. In Proceedings of SICOGG 20: 369-380. [link]
  • Jackie Yan-Ki Lai & Yenan Sun. 2018. On Apparent Parasitic Gaps in Mandarin Chinese. In Proceedings of SICOGG 20: 195-199. [link]
  • Yenan Sun. 2018. Two Kinds of Quantificational Domains: Mandarin mei with or without dou. In Proceedings of CLS 53. [preprint]

  • Numeral yi 'one' as domain restrictor in Mandarin Chinese (with Mingya Liu, Anastasia Giannakidou). 2018. Talk given at EACL 10, Milan, Italy.
